summary: The 'Just USDA Standards and Transparency Act of 2025' aims to enhance civil rights accountability and enforcement within the Department of Agriculture (USDA). It mandates corrective actions for USDA employees found to have engaged in discriminatory or retaliatory behavior. The bill establishes an Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights, an Office of Legal Advisor for Civil Rights, and an Office of the Civil Rights Ombudsperson. It also provides equitable relief mechanisms for civil rights complaints and modifies the burden of proof in appeals hearings.
